text: Innama Al-Mu'uminuna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Billahi Wa Rasulihi Wa 'Idha Kanu Ma`ahu `Ala 'Amrin Jami`in Lam Yadh/habu Hatta Yasta'dhinuhu 'Inna Al-Ladhina Yasta'dhinunaka 'Ula'ika Al-Ladhina Yu'uminuna Billahi Wa Rasulihi Fa'idha Asta'dhanuka Liba`Ä‘i Sha'nihim Fa'dhan Liman Shi'ta Minhum Wa Astaghfir Lahumu Allaha 'Inna Allaha Ghafurun Rahimun
